apis.description: --- Temp description: Get worker work hours info, ya heard ---

operations.notes: Retrieves the number of book pings made by all workers within the specified time window.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specify whether to return a file or echo output to page. Options are either raw or file. Defaults to raw.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Specify whether to return data in CSV or JSON. Options are either CSV or JSON. Defaults to JSON.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Inclusive start date to query work activity with format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. Defaults to one week ago from current date.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Exclusive start date with format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. Defaults to one week from start_date.

apis.description: --- Temp description: Get worker work hours info, ya heard ---

operations.summary: Get work activity for specific worker
operations.notes: Retrieves the book call numbers and time stamps made by a particular worker in a specified time window. Separates the calls and time stamps into activities based on the minimum time difference parameter.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user id for which to get work activity data.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specify whether to return a file or echo output to page. Options are either raw or file. Defaults to raw.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Specify whether to return data in CSV or JSON. Options are either csv or json. Defaults to JSON.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Inclusive start date to query work activity. Specify with format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. Defaults to one week ago from current date.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Exclusive end date to query work activity. Specify with format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. Defaults to one week from start_date.

parameters.name: time_diff
parameters.description: The minimum time difference, in seconds, between two book_pings to define a new activity. Defaults to 60 seconds.
